name: Sherrod GEIGER, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS FOR PHILA COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Geiger v. Court of Common Pleas for Phila County

parties: Sherrod GEIGER, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS FOR PHILA COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 5th day of July, 2016, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and/or Extraordinary Relief is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
141 A.3d 435
Sherrod GEIGER, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS FOR PHILA COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 66 EM 2016.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 5, 2016.
